mutants.code:
import re

def count_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    words = string.split()
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= 3]
    unique_words = list(set(words))
    return len(unique_words)

import re

def count_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub("[^\\w\\s\\-\\' ]", 'MUTATED', string)
    words = string.split()
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= 3]
    unique_words = list(set(words))
    return len(unique_words)

mutants.mutated_line: words = [word for word in words if len(word) > 3]

import re

def count_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub("[^\\w\\s\\-\\' ]", '', string)
    words = string.split()
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= -3]
    unique_words = list(set(words))
    return len(unique_words)
